label: Vision & Mission
heading: Vision & Mission of the Department
description: To develop AI professionals capable of creating intelligent solutions that transform industries and contribute to societal advancement through innovation and research.

sections.heading: Vision
items: To be a leading institution in AI and ML education, producing graduates who drive innovation in intelligent systems and contribute to global technological advancement

sections.heading: Mission of the Department
items: To provide comprehensive education in AI and ML fundamentals and advanced concepts
To foster research and innovation in emerging AI technologies
To develop industry-ready professionals with practical AI implementation skills
To promote ethical AI development and responsible use of intelligent systems
To encourage entrepreneurship and startup culture in AI-driven solutions
